overview: Few are as sweet and savory as Justin Cross, Chris Summers, Payton Connor, Andrew Callahan, Jackson Wright, Timber Harvest, and Justin Stone. These innocent-looking lads sport big, tasty candy and are tightly packed as they cavort with their BFF. Watching them kiss and fondle each other will make your mouth water, but watching them turn into downright dirty little bareback whores will leave you craving your very own… Tasty Twink Treats!
title: Tasty Twink Treats
